channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: See Planets Pop As Solstice Strikes: The Night Sky This Week
item.description: Each Monday, I pick out North America’s celestial highlights for the week ahead (which also apply to mid-northern latitudes in the northern hemisphere...

item.title: Why Unstructured Data Is Sorting Itself Out
item.description: Unstructured data inside organizations appears to be full of energy, but it is weighed down by an inertia which precludes it from being useful.

item.title: Why Ignoring Data Is Derailing AI-Driven Digital Transformation—And Accurate Sales Forecasting
item.description: Organizations that treat data quality and integration as strategic priorities can unlock AI’s real value.

item.title: Why Measuring Maturity Is Critical To Cyber Resiliency
item.description: Cyber resilience isn't bought—it's built. Measuring maturity across systems, processes and teams identifies weak links before attackers take advantage...

item.title: Too Many Tools, Too Many Threats: How MSPs Can Take Back Control
item.description: By simplifying their tech stack, proactively addressing security concerns and leveraging AI and automation, MSPs can deliver superior service to clien...

item.title: Orange cars

item.title: The power of a pause
item.description: The single-most effective way to invest 90 seconds a day is simple (and difficult). 18 times a day, when you’re about to offer advice, ask a question ...

item.title: Rigor and curiosity
item.description: Kids grow up with innate curiosity. It’s the hardwired instinct that permits us to walk, talk and survive long before we get to school. And at school,...

item.title: What do you need more of?
item.description: If our day (and our work) would get better if we had more: …we know where to get it. If not, then why are we spending our magical attention there?

item.title: Status (and the grass tax)
